. The Supreme Council of Antiquities of Egypt head Zahi Hawass said that the 3,300-year-old statute should be given back to Egypt. His request was backed by Prime Minister Ahmed Nazif and Culture Minister Faruq Hosni. This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artifacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, the statement read, according to Reuters. However the former Pentagon chief also admitted his biggest error during his tenure under President Bush was his failure to convince the president to accept his resignation in the wake of the Abu Ghraib prison scandal. That was such a stain on our country. To think that people in our custody were treated in that disgusting and perverted and ghastly way-- unacceptable way, Donald Rumsfeld told ABC News anchor Diane Sawyer . Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has taken the time to tell USA Today's Maria Bartiromo that his company is basically great and the Xbox 360 isn't a games console. Steve Ballmer tells the fragrant Ms Maria Bartiromo that Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment center. It's a place to socialize. It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body. He doesn't stop there though.
